data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Wilson J. E. M. (2004): Moema apurinan sp. n. and Aphyolebias boticarioi sp. n. (Teleostei: Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae): two new annual killifishes from the Rio Purus basin, Brazilian Amazon. Zootaxa 707: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158393
